multiplechoiceresponse.label: Where can you find your grades?

choicegroup.choice: This course is ungraded Almost all of the questions in this course are graded.
By e-mailing edX The nice people who answer the e-mail at edX do not have access to your grades.
On the Discussion page Everyone can read the discussion page, but only you can access your grades.

div.p: The Progress page shows you your performance in the course, and indicates the "pass" level for the course.
